panel.description_of_the_shot: Bird-eye view, A cozy suburban neighborhood lined with tidy houses and green lawns. The sun shines brightly in a clear blue sky above, casting long shadows from the charming homes. Birds are seen flitting from tree to tree, and there's a gentle breeze that rustles the leaves.

characters.costume_or_looks: A young teen with an athletic build, brown hair styled casually, wearing casual clothing. He looks youthful and eager, with bright eyes full of wonder.
A mature, powerful figure with a well-built frame. He has short cropped hair and a calming presence, wearing a sleek, form-fitting costume with a cape, signifying his status as a seasoned hero.
